thread.title: Chris Burns Comes Out As First Gay Division I Men's Basketball Coach
thread.title_full: Chris Burns Comes Out As First Gay Division I Men's Basketball Coach

author: Justin Block
title: Chris Burns Comes Out As First Gay Division I Men's Basketball Coach
text: Chris Burns Comes Out As First Gay Division I Men's Basketball Coach Outsports By Chris Burns Posted: 10/08/2015 08:50 AM EDT Sports was always a place I couldn't be me. Basketball gave me a very secure identity at a young age, which was crucial, but as I grew older, it became a juxtaposition between the accolades of my on-court success and the fear created by being gay. The more I achieved and excelled at my sport , the further I felt from myself. It made it extremely hard to fully enjoy the successes I achieved.
